attributes.action: regulate manufactures of products containing batteries to show the battery size and quantity required on the outside of the product.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be helpful for the public to be able to see the battery size and quantity used in a product without the need to open the product, that often requires a screwdriver, for example plastic toys. Products purchased as new may have this information on their packaging but thereafter they often require to be opened to see the battery size.
